name: Soda Stereo
description: Soda Stereo is an Argentinian rock band formed in Buenos Aires in 1982 by Gustavo Cerati (lead vocals, guitar), Héctor 'Zeta' Bosio (bass) and Carlos Alberto Ficicchia 'Charly Alberti' (drums).

name: Héroes del Silencio
description: Héroes del Silencio were a Spanish rock band from Zaragoza, Aragón, formed by guitarist Juan Valdivia and singer Enrique Bunbury. The lineup was completed by bassist Joaquín Cardiel and drummer Pedro Andreu. During the 1980s they experienced success around Spain and the Americas.

name: Hombres G
description: Hombres G is a Spanish pop rock band, formed in Madrid in 1983. They are widely considered one of Spain's most prominent pop groups of the 1980s and early 1990s. The band consists of David Summers (bass, vocals), Rafael Gutierrez (guitar), Dani Mezquita (guitar), and Javi Molina (drums).
popularSongs: El ataque de las chicas cocodrilo

name: Zoé
description: Zoé is a Mexican rock band formed in 1997 in Cuernavaca , Mexico . The band is led by León Larregui and made up of Sergio Acosta ( guitar ), Jesús Báez ( keyboards ), Ángel Mosqueda ( bass ) and Rodrigo Guardiola ( drums ).

name: Los Prisioneros
description: Los Prisioneros was a Chilean band, the most important in its country 123 and one of the most prominent and influential in Latin America . 4 ​5 ​6 ​7 ​8​ Formed in the 1980s in the commune of San Miguel , it was initially composed of Jorge González ( voice , bass and main composer), Claudio Narea ( guitar , voice and choirs ) and Miguel Tapia ( drums , voice and choirs).
popularSongs: El baile de los que sobran

name: Aterciopelados
description: Aterciopelados is an emblematic Colombian alternative rock band , led by Andrea Echeverri and Héctor Buitrago . It had its origin in 1990 under the name of Delia and the Amino Acids and later Aterciopelados in 1993.
